screens_implemented: Calendar - Visual progress tracking with dot visualization
Insights - Premium analytics and pattern visualization

theme_system.brand_colors: Calm blues and greens from Stage 08
theme_system.typography: System font with Dynamic Type support

stage02_to_screens.unlimited_habit_creation: Implemented in database layer and Habits screen
stage02_to_screens.visual_dot_calendar: Implemented in Calendar screen with colored dot visualization
stage02_to_screens.simple_tap_tracking: Implemented in Today screen with single-tap completion
stage02_to_screens.streak_visualization: Implemented in Today screen with streak counters

stage03_to_ui.tab_navigation: Implemented with Expo Router tab layout
stage03_to_ui.today_screen_layout: Large tappable habit cards with colored dots
stage03_to_ui.calendar_view: Monthly grid with colored dots for completions
stage03_to_ui.accessibility_features: VoiceOver support, 44pt touch targets, high contrast

stage04_to_subscriptions.freemium_model: Core features unlimited, premium features gated behind 'pro' entitlement
stage04_to_subscriptions.revenuecat_integration: Full SDK integration with environment-based configuration
stage04_to_subscriptions.paywall_presentation: Modal paywall triggered by premium feature access

stage05_to_architecture.data_storage: SQLite database with migration system implemented
stage05_to_architecture.state_management: React Context API for theme and app state

stage08_to_branding.app_name: Simple Habit Dots implemented in app.json
stage08_to_branding.color_scheme: Calm blues and greens implemented in theme system
stage08_to_branding.design_philosophy: Clean, minimal interface without overwhelming complexity

stage09_to_metadata.marketing_positioning: Only habit tracker with unlimited free features
